A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Peter Ranier says \"The fanatics will love it.\"  I'm a fanatic\, and it was the absolute worst of all the Star Wars movies.  I'm not snobby - I actually liked huge parts of the prequels.  I liked Rogue One.  I liked the Force Awakens.  I absolutely despised this movie - not just as a Star Wars movie\, but as a movie in general.  I'm not going to write a huge review\, and no\, I'm not comparing it to the first trilogy.  I wanted it to take a new direction.  This just happens to be absolutely the wrong direction because it was so horribly done.
